text: Toyama Gokoku Shrine (富山縣護國神社, Toyamaken gokoku jinja) is a Gokoku shrine in Toyama, a city in Toyama Prefecture in Japan. The shrine is dedicated to the kami or spirits of those who died as martyrs serving their country. The shrine's annual festivals are celebrated on April 25 and October 5. It was established in 1913. == Related pages == * Toyama Chukyoin == Other websites == * Official website Category:Shinto shrines Category:Gokoku shrines Category:Shinto shrines in Toyama Prefecture Category:Shrines in Toyama
title: Toyama Gokoku Shrine
